metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17263 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** In libyal libfwsi before 20191006,libfwsi_extension_block_copy_from_byte_stream in libfwsi_extension_block.chas a heap-based buffer over-read because rejection of an unsupported sizeonly considers values less than 6, even though values of 6 and 7 are alsounsupported. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described in the GitHubissue.

criterions.comment: liblnk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
libfwsi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
